body_html:
By the way, my current temporary solution is to add this instead of including eager/c_api_internal.h:

#include "tensorflow/core/common_runtime/eager/tensor_handle.h"

struct TFE_TensorHandle {
  TFE_TensorHandle(const tensorflow::Tensor& t)
      : handle(new tensorflow::TensorHandle(t, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr)) {}

  tensorflow::TensorHandle* handle;
};

However, I believe that I shouldn't need to replicate code here. If you think this is ok for now, feel free to close this issue. :)
